en.overview: Current psychological state of the crypto world:
en.greedDescription: Greed is an insatiable desire for more than one needs or deserves, especially wealth. It is often seen as a negative quality, as it can lead to selfish and harmful behavior. This is especially true when buying cryptocurrency at this time.
en.neutralDescription: Neutral is somewhere between Fear and Greed - and indicates that neither buyers nor sellers are in control of the market. This could mean that the cryptocurrency markets are cooling down or getting warmer - but the emotion is not strong enough.
en.fearDescription: Fear is an intensely unpleasant emotion in response to perceived or recognized danger or threat -  triggering the fight-or-flight response. Fear acts as a primal mechanism for survival, prompting us to either confront the threat (fight) or escape it (flight) - both usually resulting in cryptocurrency assets being sold.
